turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you get me an iced pumpkin latte at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes! What size you want? and What store did you want me to get it at? Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes! Starbucks. I would love a TALL

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I'll go to the closer starbucks and get you a tall iced pumpkin latte

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much! How much do I owe you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll take care of it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow! You didn't need to do that

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's my pleasure, I like working for you. Besides you paid for my lunch reccently.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I did.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want anything else at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I may want a cream danish, or coffee cake

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, which one do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wonder which one is cheaper option

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I would say the coffee cake it's up to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'll take a cream danish and an iced pumpkin latte

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok are you sure that's what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes! thank you. Here, let me give you money for the items

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Here, take a 20.00 out of my wallet for the purchase

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! I can do that

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also go ahead and get something on me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wow! Your so kind thank you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem, please return the change though

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, That can be done with no issue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you! I like your loyalty.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, please get going I have a busy day ahead of me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I'll get going right now!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your Welcome!!!
